thread.title: China's Lisu minority guards a culture of crossbows

title: China's Lisu minority guards a culture of crossbows
text:
China's Lisu minority guards a culture of crossbows Wednesday, April 25, 2018 - 01:25
For China's Lisu, a mostly Christian ethnic group from the mountains along the China-Myanmar border, preserving the culture of the crossbow is an important way to stay healthy and maintain community ties.
For China's Lisu, a mostly Christian ethnic group from the mountains along the China-Myanmar border, preserving the culture of the crossbow is an important way to stay healthy and maintain community ties. //reut.rs/2KfwVwG
